WCES Kids of Steel Training Club meets everyday from 7:30-8:00 a.m. Our kids run or walk a mile each morning before school starts to train for the one mile Kids Marathon in Pittsburgh on Saturday, April 30th! Transportation to the start line is covered by a $1000 grant from P3R. https://t.co/uIHE7NVk3j
